name: Everpunk
description:
:.You are a hero, trying to defeat a dark lord in his tower. A pretty classic story, really:.

Everpunk was created for the Finnish College Jam #4, where the Jams theme 'Aetherpunk' - and the dyslexia of the team - led to the name 'Everpunk'

----------------------------------------

Art: Annika Riikonen

Code: Lahja Pulkkinen
